'''1.5.1 Build 7''' is the seventh build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released on April 22, 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Updating MinecraftEdu using the Launcher should now work.
* Modified server GUI to work better on Mac.
